enb_long_title: Sixth Session of the Ad Hoc Group on the Berlin Mandate
sentences: Several participants provided favorable reviews of the non- group`s efforts to fulfill its non-mandate of streamlining the Framework Compilation.
One participant reported that the non-group narrowed the options and will submit a revised text to AGBM.
Another commented that some delegates appeared unclear on the concept of streamlining and used the meeting as an opportunity to regurgitate lengthy, all too familiar positions.
